reviewText: Nightline Did an excellent job in showcasing how America's Bomb Technicians train for Dangerous Situations.  However, it would have been nice if they could have showed more about what happens at Red Stone and out in the field than just showing twenty-minutes.  Initially, I was expecting a longer segment because on the product description on amazon, it says 42 minutes but in reality, they only showed the short twenty-minute version.  All in all, it was interesting to watch.
